/* attendanceMapper.attendanceTotalCount */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT atdinfo.attendance_seq, atdinfo.member_seq, atdinfo.product_seq, ( SELECT product_name FROM PRODUCTINFO WHERE product_seq = atdinfo.product_seq ) AS product_name, ( SELECT name FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = atdinfo.member_seq) AS name, ( SELECT phone FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = atdinfo.member_seq) AS phone, ( SELECT sex FROM MEMBERINFO WHERE member_seq = atdinfo.member_seq) AS sex, atdinfo.attendance_date, atdinfo.register_date, atdinfo.register_id, atdinfo.modify_date, atdinfo.modify_id, atdinfo.del_yn, atdinfo.store_seq FROM ATTENDANCEINFO atdinfo WHERE atdinfo.store_seq = #{storeSeq} AND atdinfo.del_yn = 'N' ORDER BY atdinfo.attendance_date ASC ) AS temp , (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) AS R
WHERE 1=1 AND ( temp.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR temp.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR temp.product_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR DATE_FORMAT(temp.attendance_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') )

/* attendanceMapper.attendanceDetail */ SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS row_num, temp.member_seq, temp.name, temp.sex, temp.birth, temp.phone, temp.email, temp.memo, temp.store_seq, temp.attendance_seq, temp.attendance_date FROM ( SELECT mbinfo.member_seq, mbinfo.name, mbinfo.sex, mbinfo.birth, mbinfo.phone, mbinfo.email, mbinfo.memo, mbinfo.store_seq, atdinfo.attendance_seq, atdinfo.attendance_date FROM MEMBERINFO mbinfo INNER JOIN ATTENDANCEINFO atdinfo ON mbinfo.member_seq = atdinfo.member_seq WHERE mbinfo.del_yn = 'N' AND atdinfo.del_yn ='N' AND mbinfo.member_seq = #{memberSeq} AND mbinfo.store_seq = #{storeSeq} ORDER BY atdinfo.attendance_date ASC ) AS temp, (SELECT @ROWNUM :=0) AS R ORDER BY row_num DESC
